WorkItem.ClosedComment: Feature will be addressed by Rawr3.
WorkItem.Description:
Similar to not scaling with font size, but different enough to create a new issue for it.
 
My laptop which has a fairly low 1024x768 resolution, where the bracer and 2nd trinket tend to fall of the screen. Please either add a scrollbar, or downscale the icons if the window is smaller than what's minimally required.
 
Thanks!
WorkItem.Summary: GUI doesnt scale with screen resolution

Comments.Message: I am having same problem, If there is a way that I can fix this, please let me know. Thank you

Rawr3 is chugging along the development line.  When it's ready, this will be a non-issue.  That's what Astrylian is getting at - it's not worth going out of the way to fix in the meantime if the upcoming version doesn't have the problem.
